Category: Software Management 
Language: Multilingual including Spanish 
Contains Serial 
Compatibility: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 

Description: 
------------ 
QuarkXPress 9, the popular application layout and design, comes in April. In this new version of Quark has invested about 3 years, so the improvements are very significant. But mostly embraces the publication optimized for different platforms. 

Quark announced QuarkXPress 9, the new version of its software design and layout, which comes with the intention not only to compete in the field of printing and publishing, but also to become an alternative for editing digital content in the new formats are emerging and to publish content adapted to mobile devices. 

One of the most outstanding features of QuarkXPress Studio 9 is the APP, publishing system that allows to publish content on the iPhone directly without the designers have expertise in programming. while QuarkXPress Blio 9 include support for e-reader, a platform for creating e-books in a comfortable, to later be put on sale in formats tailored to different readers available (and from the store Blio books in collaboration with Baker & Taylor). 

Inspired by a passion for improving the design, QuarkXPress 9 complements the way they work 
creative professionals so they can: 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Move freely through the application using the intuitive interface of QuarkXPress 9. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Share print content using multimedia authoring tools with built-in Web and Flash. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Maintain control to create stunning text with font created by designers. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Work in a faster and smarter with native Illustrator and Photoshop photo enhancement tools, pencils, text, characters outside the range fully customizable, advanced baseline grids, and more. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Publish globally with dictionaries and word division for more than 30 languages, using a single file format, open and print a project created anywhere in the world and set designs and fonts for East Asian high-fidelity . 

Improvements: 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Create your own applications with the application IPAD Studio for QuarkXPress, then publish and manage their own interactive publications. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Creating interactive content for the eReader Blio Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® - the most accessible and versatile player on the market. Then sold through the online bookstore Blio. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Convert your presentations QuarkXPress standardized electronic books for the iPad, Sony Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Reader, NOOK Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â®, and more. 

Other improvements 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ XLSX import: Import XLSX files 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Style Sheets: The style sheet format without prejudice to local 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Creating a table: Tables Break flowing through multiple pages with headers and footers to repeat, even when they are rooted in a history 

This new version has focused on the convergence between different media in which they can output the same product, with particular attention to mobile devices. Therefore, many new tools such as Conditional Styles marks the final appearance of the design according to certain rules or ShapeMaker, creating complex forms and shapes, quickly, are two of the best letters of QuarkXpress 9. 

Some of the enhanced features in QuarkXPress 9 are automation capabilities for design and printing of periodicals, as well as the Web, interactive content in Flash format (SWF). 

System Requirements 
- Microsoft Windows XP (Service Pack 2 or 3), Windows Vista 1.0, or Windows 7 
- Microsoft. NET Framework 3.5 SP1 
- 2GB RAM (1GB minimum) 
- 1GB hard disk space.
